messages.subject: upstate? NY / vida buena
messages.msgSnippet: Ahhhh, lower Columbia County is NOT Upstate!!!!   LOL I say I live near Albany, people say, oh you re upstate.  Now I used to live in Plattsburgh near the
messages.messageBody:
Ahhhh, lower Columbia County is NOT Upstate!!!! LOL
I say I live near Albany, people say, oh you're upstate. Now I used to live
in Plattsburgh near the Canadian border....that's upstate!!! It all depends
on how you look at it. Everyone in the city (NY city) says anything north of
the city is upstate....in other words the rest of the state!
Amanda


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
